title: NLPGA 13th INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE AND EXHIBITION
description:
The Nigeria Liquefied Petroleum Gas Association (NLPGA) has set a plan in motion to play a crucial part in helping the Federal Government bridge the energy transition gap in Nigeria. To this end the association will be using it's 13th annual conference and exhibition to host dialogue and proffer solutions on using the LPG to boost the energy transition gap.

The NLPGA for 13 years has consistently held an annual international conference which is the premier industry event that brings together major players in one location. The conference in 2022 in collaboration with the Nigeria LNG Limited (NLNG) celebrated the 15th year anniversary of uninterrupted supply of domestic LPG in the country. The intervention saw supply of LPG grow from 60,000MT in 2007 to over 1.3million MT in 2021 (a growth of over 1,000%). This scheme has encouraged massive investments in LPG infrastructure and created over 150,000 jobs in the sector.

This year’s conference offers opportunities to build relationships with industry participants and gain knowledge of the unique financing, insurance cover and other business enabling requirements of the sector.
short_description: The Nigeria Liquefied Petroleum Gas Association (NLPGA) has set a plan in motion to play a crucial part in helping the Federal Government bridge the energy transition gap in Nigeria.

title: NLPGA-C&E-xxx- 2019 conference programme agenda
description:
THEME:  Harmonizing Development And Growth In Nigeria And Africa
DATE:    26-27 November 2019
VENUE:    Federal Palace Hotel, Lagos Nigeria

Our dear highly esteemed distinguished guest, delegates, speakers, partners, members and exhibitors, it is indeed my pleasure to welcome you to the 9th edition of our annual LPG International Conference & Exhibition holding this time at the Balmoral Events Centre, Federal Palace Hotel, Victoria Island, Lagos


See downloadable document for more

title: 15th Anniversary of Dom LPG
description:
THEME:    Looking Back & Looking Forward  
DATE:    25th - 26th OCT, 2022 
VENUE:    Eko Hotels Convention Centre, Lagos Nigeria.


W E L C O M E N O T E

It seems just like yesterday when the Domestic LPG Supply intervention 
programme was started. Fifteen years later we are celebrating a seminal year in 
which a government initiative that was an intervention scheme has led to a growing 
sector of the economy.

The Nigeria Liquefied Petroleum Gas Association (NLPGA) in collaboration with the 
Nigeria LNG Limited (NLNG) has reasons to celebrate. This intervention has seen the 
supply of LPG grow from 60,000MT in 2007 to over 1.3million MT in 2021 (a growth of 
over 1,000%). This scheme has encouraged massive investments in LPG 
infrastructure and created over 150,000 jobs in the sector.

See downloadable document for more

title: 2ND WEST AFRICA LPG EXPO AND NLPGA SUMMIT E-BROCHURE
description:
Gas Academy together with the Nigeria LPG Association, is organising the 2nd West Africa LPG Expo on 23rd - 24th June 2022 at the stunning Balmoral Exhibition Centre within the Federal Palace Hotel,  Lagos. 

Visitors are expected to attain momentous insight of the LPG market and network with more than 3,000 LPG professionals across the value chain
